posts.text: Lol, polls. LMAO

Why bother? EC was built to protect slavery, and the logistics of a true democratic voice in the 1800s.

Now, tech enables us to take a stronger voice in our government. We should downsize the role of the republic and embrace direct voice on major issues/amendments, etc.

We have to accept there is a new major party, the Republican Nationalist. 

This close election is going to permanently shift the GOP, bc they will see it as a clear path of win. GOP has shown they are willing to burn it down if they get to rule over the ashes.

Hoping you are right, but I think it was called way to early by Fox and AP.

A quick analysis: if Trump maintains 6:4 ratio of the most recent drop from Maricopa and Biden maintain his higher than Clinton performance, Trump would eek out 80k votes vs. Biden’s current lead of 79k!!! 

So, decision desk at Fox and AP are smarter than me... so I sincerely hope there was a obvious exit poll or early vote analysis in play
